issue.title: [C++] Store shared_ptr to boxed arrays in RecordBatch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1495](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1495). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Construct lazily to avoid performance penalty, but also enable result of `RecordBatch::column` to be dereferenced
